ch0272_00_klara/0101_0701_01_10:
Aha! There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Right on time, too!
ch0272_00_klara/0101_0701_02_10:
OK, so d’you think you could help me out with
my training?
ch0272_00_klara/7101_0701_01_10:
If I’m gonna be on a team, I’d rather it be with
someone popular, y’know.
ch0272_00_klara/7101_0701_02_10:
It’d be even cooler if they got into a pinch during
battle every now and then.
ch0272_00_klara/7101_0701_03_10:
I could step in, save them in a real cute way,
and get ALL the attention!
ch0272_00_klara/7102_0701_01_10:
Don’t ya think poison that slooowly damages your
opponents is, like, the absolute coolest?
ch0272_00_klara/7102_0701_02_10:
It gradually flows through their body and makes
them feel real dizzy.
ch0272_00_klara/7102_0701_03_10:
Someday, I’m gonna drench you with my poison,
and it’ll drive you Kla-razy!
ch0272_00_klara/7103_0701_01_10:
When I first joined the Master Dojo, I didn’t think
too deeply about it, but now I’m really happy I
went there.
ch0272_00_klara/7103_0701_02_10:
There’s this student who joined after me who’s,
like, real annoying. But thanks to them, I managed
to work more on myself.
ch0272_00_klara/7103_0701_03_10:
Some day, I’m gonna thank them by beating
’em senseless!
ch0272_00_klara/7104_0701_01_10:
I managed to become a Gym Leader in Galar
’cause I gave it my all!
ch0272_00_klara/7104_0701_02_10:
I thrive on compliments, so keep heaping on the
praise and adoration, ’kay?
ch0272_00_klara/7104_0701_03_10:
Becoming a Gym Leader really is a fantastic
achievement! Even if our gym is still in the
minor division.
ch0272_00_klara/7105_0701_01_10:
When I see someone like you who happens to be
young and talented...
ch0272_00_klara/7105_0701_02_10: it gets my blood pumping through my entire body.
ch0272_00_klara/7105_0701_03_10:
You might be really strong, but I ain’t losing
to you, mate!
ch0272_00_klara/1701_0702_01_10:
Now promise me you won’t tell anyone that I
skipped training, ’kay?
ch0272_00_klara/2501_0701_01_10:
There are soooo many popular people here on
Pasio. I ain’t standing out!
ch0272_00_klara/2501_0701_02_10: Uuugh... Look at all those famous faces...
ch0272_00_klara/2501_0701_04_10:
If I become friends with them, wouldn’t that
actually work in my favor?
ch0272_00_klara/2501_0702_01_10: You know a lot of people here on Pasio, right?
ch0272_00_klara/2501_0702_02_10: Could you pleeease introduce me to everyone?
ch0272_00_klara/2511_0701_01_10: I used to be an underground pop singer, y’know.
ch0272_00_klara/2511_0701_02_10:
“A star that has both cuteness and the virulence of
poison.” That’s how I promoted myself!
ch0272_00_klara/2511_0701_03_10:
But, ugh, I only managed to sell eight copies of my
debut album.
ch0272_00_klara/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m gonna make it big as a Gym Leader, and this
time I’ll get way more popular!
ch0272_00_klara/2511_0702_02_10:
Hold up, though... Don’t you think all the
Poison-type Gym Leaders kinda stand out?
ch0272_00_klara/2511_0702_03_10:
I mean, there’s even a ninja and a musician.
I’ve got tons of rivals, huh...
ch0272_00_klara/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornings are a drag...but I want to become
stronger than everyone else, so I guess that means
I have to work harder than everyone else, too.
ch0272_00_klara/3003_0701_01_10:
Since it’s lunchtime, shall I treat you to a
full-course feast of venom?
ch0272_00_klara/3005_0701_01_10:
That’s enough self-improvement for today! Too
much work is bad for my complexion, you know?
